name: VOCAL Technologies
tag_list: voice-compression, echo-cancellation, noise-reduction, dereverberation, fax-protocol, data-modem-protocol, voice-over-ip, fax-over-ip, radio-over-ip, modem-over-ip, hd-video-conferencing, analog-telephone-adapter, lawful-interception, melp, melpe, g-711
overview:
VOCAL Technologies, Ltd., founded in 1986, develops hardware and software design solutions for voice, video, fax and data communications. VOCAL’s reference designs and software solutions are available under license for OEM product development. Software may be licensed as source code or binary. Custom engineering solutions are also available.

VOCAL’s modular software suite has been engineered to support a wide variety of custom embedded applications for OEM developers. VOCAL reference designs have been incorporated into ATAs, VoIP servers and CPE, HPNA-based IPBXs, video surveillance, voice and data RF devices, secure government devices, lawful interception software, medical devices, HD video, two-way radios and radio networks, embedded modems, and RAS over IP for business, government, military, and consumer products.

VOCAL’s designs are available for leading DSP, RISC and CISC processors and operating systems. Supported devices include DSPs from Texas Instruments, Analog Devices, and Freescale as well as x86, ARM, MIPS, PowerPC and PowerQUICC general purpose processors. Operating systems include Android, iOS, Linux, Microsoft Windows, Mac OS, and Symbian.
